TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ToastButton extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.Notifications.IToastButton
Public NotInheritable Class ToastButton Implements IToastButton

Docs.summary: A button that the user can click on a Toast notification.

Public Sub New (content As String, arguments As String)

Docs.param: The text to display on the button.
App-defined string of arguments that the app can later retrieve once it is activated when the user clicks the button.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets additional options relating to activation of the toast button. New in Creators Update
Gets or sets what type of activation this button will use when clicked. Defaults to Foreground.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.HintActionId : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets an identifier used in telemetry to identify your category of action. This should be something like "Delete", "Reply", or "Archive". In the upcoming toast telemetry dashboard in Dev Center, you will be able to view how frequently your actions are being clicked.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets an optional image icon for the button to display (required for buttons adjacent to inputs like quick reply).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.Notifications.ToastButton SetSnoozeActivation() cil managed

Docs.summary: Configures the button to use system snooze activation when the button is clicked, using the default system snooze time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.Notifications.ToastButton SetSnoozeActivation(string selectionBoxId) cil managed
Public Function SetSnoozeActivation (selectionBoxId As String) As ToastButton

Docs.param: The ID of an existing which allows the user to pick a custom snooze time. The ID's of the s inside the selection box must represent the snooze interval in minutes. For example, if the user selects an item that has an ID of "120", then the notification will be snoozed for 2 hours. When the user clicks this button, if you specified a SelectionBoxId, the system will parse the ID of the selected item and snooze by that amount of minutes.
Docs.summary: Configures the button to use system snooze activation when the button is clicked, with a snooze time defined by the specified selection box.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.Notifications.ToastButton SetTextBoxId(string textBoxId) cil managed
Public Function SetTextBoxId (textBoxId As String) As ToastButton

Docs.summary: Sets the ID of an existing in order to have this button display to the right of the input, achieving a quick reply scenario.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.TextBoxId : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the ID of an existing in order to have this button display to the right of the input, achieving a quick reply scenario.
